column4: I'm having trouble getting 3d graphics to work on my older computer running Jaunty. Graphics is Intel 82810 DC-133 integrated. I've read that the newer version is causing some problems. Is there a fix for this older machine?
I don't think there is a finished fix yet
if you're experiencing the intel driver bug thingy
I'm not sure, I haven't seen it myself.. but I seem to recall it had to do with 3d performance
